mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select rownum as rn, b.* from ( (select * from board order by num desc) b)) where rn >=#{startNum}) where rn <=#{endNum}
mapper.insert: insert into board(num, userid, pass, email, title, content, imgfilename) values(board_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{pass}, #{email}, #{title} ,#{content}, #{imgfilename})
mapper.update: update board set readcount = readcount+1 where num = #{param1}
mapper.select: select * from reply2 where boardnum=#{param1} order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply2 (num, boardnum, userid, content) values(reply_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
